name: Anubis
description:
You are the prince of the pharao. You have all but you are bored. Finally you decide to search the treasure of the god Anubis. First you must jump'n'run through the desert, then you must play some memory. In the temple is jump'n'run again, and in the end you must fight against the servants of Anubis.

You play with cursor-keys, only the memory-game is with mouse (with all mousebuttons!)
